feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.28.0 Lots of bug fixes + Admin panel improvements
entry.content:
Seems release is bugged.. fixed in 0.28.1 ! all release notes still apply to 0.28.1

Enhancements

  • tessdata (OCR) available to local Windows users by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1677
  • General gradle dependency version updates
  • PDFBox update! Lots of bug fixes!
  • Admin panel - Enhanced User Management & Fix: #1630 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1658
  • Lots of language updates as always!

Bugs

  • Fix: Conditional Attribute Binding for the multiple Attribute in the File Selector Fragment by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1665
  • JPEG200 PDFbox support
  • Alpha channel issue via PDFBox fixed with new dependency version

What's Changed

  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1651
  • Updated Japanese translation by @tkymmm in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1654
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1655
  • Fix: Conditional Attribute Binding for the multiple Attribute in the File Selector Fragment by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1665
  • redesign footer by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1674
  • Updated brazilian portuguese translation by @rafaelchagas9 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1673
  • tessdata available to local Windows users by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1677
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1675
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties - remove image in home by @kmau in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1661
  • Bump org.apache.pdfbox:xmpbox from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1670
  • Bump io.github.pixee:java-security-toolkit from 1.1.3 to 1.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1667
  • Bump org.projectlombok:lombok from 1.18.32 to 1.18.34 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1684
  • Bump com.bucket4j:bucket4j_jdk17-core from 8.12.1 to 8.13.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1683
  • Bump org.springframework:spring-webmvc from 6.1.9 to 6.1.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1680
  • Bump edu.sc.seis.launch4j from 3.0.5 to 3.0.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1686
  • Bump org.apache.pdfbox:pdfbox from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1691
  • Bump com.github.jk1.dependency-license-report from 2.8 to 2.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1690
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1687
  • PR changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1693
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.13.0 to 1.13.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1689
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1695
  • Admin panel - Enhanced User Management & Fix: #1630 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1658
  • Bump ch.qos.logback:logback-classic from 1.5.6 to 1.5.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1685
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1696
  • Update build.gradle to use commmon versions by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1697
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1698
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1699

New Contributors

  • @rafaelchagas9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1673
  • @kmau made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1661

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.27.0...v0.28.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: v0.28.1 Lots of bug fixes + Admin panel improvements (Re-Release of 0.28.0 but fixed)
New release for Stirling PDF: 0.28.2 WEBP support and Bug fixes
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Reduced google icon size for faster loading!
  • PDF to Image now supports WEBP !
  • Language updates as always!

Bug fixes

  • extract images not supporting pages that didn't contain images
  • yaml file not supporting descriptions longer than a set size
  • Fix ConcurrentModificationException for feature
  • other general fixes

What's Changed

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1701
  • increases some versions in the workflows by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1707
  • corrects the link to the country selection by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1717
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1713
  • Add Option to Specify Installation Method in Bug Report Template by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1710
  • Fix: Failed authentication #1704 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1708
  • Fix: YamlFile - String length limit disable by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1716
  • Fix ConcurrentModificationException by modifying resources outside the iteration. by @PingLin8888 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1719
  • reduce google font size by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1723
  • Typing error in README.md by @crnobog69 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1721
  • Bump com.bucket4j:bucket4j_jdk17-core from 8.13.1 to 8.14.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1720
  • Updated pt_BR ignored translations; Improved pt_BR translation by @guinuxbr in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1705
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1724
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1725
  • Add: Convert PDF to WebP by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1666
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1727

New Contributors

  • @crnobog69 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1721
  • @guinuxbr made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1705

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.28.1...v0.28.2

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.28.3 bug fixes
entry.content:
What's Changed

Minor Enhancements

  • Fix: introduces the verification of the python installation by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1730
  • Cleanup startup logs by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1739

Bug fixes

  • Multiple flag fix (re-enable multiple uploads) by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1742
  • Increase linecounts to ensure auto-rename works for other usecases #1618 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1752
  • Fixes for folder scan not working for non PDF files #1552 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1753
  • Fix for font not supporting numeric etc for watermarks and other features by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1753
  • Fix: Missing multi-selection and Python validation by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1740
  • Fix: authentication ApiKey NullPointerException by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1744

Translation Changes

  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1732
  • Removes double equal signs by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1750
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1751

Other Changes

  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1746
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1754
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1755
  • Fixes for eager loading by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1748
  • Fixes LazyInitializationException in User entity by @DimK10 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1749

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.28.2...v0.28.3

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.29.0 Multi-tool supports split and images, Split by Chapters and more!
entry.content:
Major Enhancements

  • Added https://www.stirlingpdf.com/ to the footer, We have paid support coming for all companies that want it, Please sign up in Contact Us form to find out more in future! Surveys to come...
  • Add image support to multi-tool page by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1769
  • Add document splitting functionality to the multi-tools page by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1808
  • Feature: Split PDFs by Chapters/Bookmarks by @Rudra-241 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1786
  • Added functionality to set font size and font type to add page numbers in both frontend and backend. by @creator1999 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1783
  • Introduced legal document support (Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy etc) within settings.yml.
  • Enhanced metrics collection to include unique user counts.

Bug fixes

  • Change display name WEPB to WEBP by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1762
  • [Bug Fix] Multiple Bug Fixes by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1836
  • [Bug Fix] Fix Firefox Page Drag Bug by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1837

Minor Enhancements/Changes

  • Footer link to Stirlingpdf.com by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1827
  • Page Scale: add pageSize KEEP #1798 by @nachokb in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1800
  • Stirling-PDF now sets metadata for all PDF files to mark stirling-pdf as editor/creator etc

Other (Lots of UI fixes and tweaks thankyou!!)

  • Validates the file name by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1793
  • Fix insertFileButton referencing the old addPdfs method. by @FiratUsta in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1809
  • Fixed reduce extra space between input field & button #1829 by @dk-talks in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1848
  • Minor fixes stopping invalid sessions by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1850
  • fix(stamp): radius styles of color input by @designtesbrot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1862
  • Changed
    to get a consistent overlay-pdf form by @DrSommer20 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1849
  • Changed Spacing between between Buttons and Spacing of Settings Menu by @DrSommer20 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1864
  • fix:Remove add image and Align download input file with same width as pdf file input by @see-more in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1884
  • Lots of changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1889
  • Update add-watermark.html by @Charan19001A0231 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1893
  • Metadata handling for all PDF endpoints by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1894
  • Fix: Left-align the submit button on each card for pdf operation by @Ahar28 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1897
  • Css changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1899

Docker Updates

  • [Snyk] Security upgrade alpine from 3.20.2 to 3.20.3 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1839
  • [Snyk] Security upgrade alpine from 3.20.2 to 3.20.3 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1840
  • Bump alpine from 3.20.2 to 3.20.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1865

Translation Changes

  • Update german translation by @maxi322 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1759
  • Updated es_ES translation by @NeilJared in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1776
  • Update messages_de_DE.properties by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1784
  • Language change contribution (Hindi) by @Vamsi1810 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1799
  • Update translation files by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1812
  • test by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1814
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1815
  • Update messages_sv_SE.properties by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1820
  • Update messages_ro_RO.properties by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1822
  • Update messages_ar_AR.properties by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1825
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1854
  • Update messages_zh_CN.properties by @xifangczy in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1871
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1891

Other Changes

  • Bump springBootVersion from 3.3.2 to 3.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1763
  • Bump org.springframework.boot from 3.3.2 to 3.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1764
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1767
  • removes duplicate dependencies by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1792
  • Bump io.micrometer:micrometer-core from 1.13.3 to 1.13.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1866
  • Bump com.fathzer:javaluator from 3.0.4 to 3.0.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1867
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1873

New Contributors

  • @Rudra-241 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1786
  • @Vamsi1810 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1799
  • @FiratUsta made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1809
  • @creator1999 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1783
  • @dk-talks made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1848
  • @nachokb made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1800
  • @designtesbrot made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1862
  • @DrSommer20 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1849
  • @xifangczy made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1871
  • @see-more made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1884
  • @Charan19001A0231 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1893
  • @Ahar28 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1897
